vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and (1) an ordinance granting a WMU-5 Walkable Mixed Use District; and (2) a resolution accepting deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant on property zoned an R-7.5(A) Single Family District, on the north line of East Wheatland Road, east of University Hills Boulevard
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval of (1) a WMU-5 Walkable Mixed Use District
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval of (1) a WMU-5 Walkable Mixed Use District; and (2) approval of deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant
Z245-176(MB)
